semantic_identifier: 19: feat: Backend: persist and expose ownership/audit metadata for issue tags and priority updates

sections.text:
## Description

Adds backend support for field-level attribution on issue tags and priority without changing existing update behavior.

Implementation:
- Introduces per-field metadata storage for `tags` and `priority`, capturing:
  - current owner (team/user)
  - last editor (actor identity)
  - last edited timestamp
  - update source (UI/API/integration)
- On tag/priority mutations, writes metadata alongside the primary change in the same transaction to keep audit data consistent with the update.
- Extends read models/serializers to expose the new metadata in issue responses (non-breaking additions).
- Includes lightweight backfill/defaulting for existing issues (metadata left null/unknown where historical attribution is unavailable).

Notes:
- No enforcement or approval logic is added; this PR only records and returns metadata for later use.
- API changes are additive; existing clients are unaffected unless they opt into reading the new fields.

## How Has This Been Tested?

staging
